oig-unified_soda_dialog.Paper Title: SODA: Million-scale Dialogue Distillation with Social Commonsense Contextualization

oig-unified_abstract_infill.Paper Title: Dialog Inpainting: Turning Documents into Dialogs

oig-unified_unnatural_instructions.Paper Title: Unnatural Instructions: Tuning Language Models with (Almost) No Human Labor

oig-unified_mathqa_flanv2_kojma_cot.Paper Title: MathQA: Towards Interpretable Math Word Problem Solving with Operation-Based Formalisms

oig-unified_poetry_instructions.License Notes: Poetry data of mostly classical poems https://huggingface.co/datasets/merve/poetry https://huggingface.co/datasets/matthh/gutenberg-poetry-corpus. Because the poems are from different time periods, some are in public domain while other are not.

oig-unified_poetry_2_song.License Notes: unified_poetry_instructions (and https://huggingface.co/datasets/shahules786/PoetryFoundationData) translated to song-like structures. Inherits license from unified_poetry instructions

oig-unified_multi_news.Paper Title: Multi-News: a Large-Scale Multi-Document Summarization Dataset and Abstractive Hierarchical Model

Inferred Metadata.PwC Description: #5 best model for Multi-Document Summarization on Multi-News (ROUGE-1 metric)

oig-unified_grade_school_math_instructio.Paper Title: Training Verifiers to Solve Math Word Problems
oig-unified_grade_school_math_instructio.License Notes: Created by OAI but no license specified. The license provided looks like it is for the code.

oig-unified_sqlv2.License Notes: public text 2 sql datasets built on SPIDER, SPARC, and COSQL

oig-unified_chip2.License Notes: generated from many public datasets (including natural instructions and anthropics HH) and from the web. Described here: https://huggingface.co/datasets/laion/OIG#unified-chip2jsonl--oig-small-chip2-210000

oig-unified_nq.Paper Title: Natural Questions: A Benchmark for Question Answering Research

Inferred Metadata.PwC Description: #7 best model for Question Answering on Natural Questions (long) (F1 metric)

oig-unified_joke_explanations.License Notes: a very small dataset of joke explanations crawled from the public web

oig-unified_openai_summarize_tldr.Paper Title: Learning to summarize from human feedback

oig-unified_unifiedskg_instructions.Paper Title: UnifiedSKG: Unifying and Multi-Tasking Structured Knowledge Grounding with Text-to-Text Language Models
oig-unified_unifiedskg_instructions.License Notes: They unify 21 knowledge-intensive datasets (e.g., semantic parsing) into a unified format

Inferred Metadata.PwC Description: SOTA for Task-Oriented Dialogue Systems on KVRET (Entity F1 metric)

oig-unified_sqlv1.License Notes: public text 2 sql datasets built on SPIDER, SPARC, and COSQL

oig-unified_plot_screenplay_books_dialog.License Notes: partly from Wiki and partly from Web

oig-unified_essays.License Notes: Built on the ChristophSchuhmann/essays-with-instructions dataset which pulls lots of their essays from the IvyPanda website used for essay writing help. It is unclear what license should be applied here though this may help: https://ivypanda.com/copyright

oig-unified_conv_finqa.Paper Title: ConvFinQA: Exploring the Chain of Numerical Reasoning in Conversational Finance Question Answering
oig-unified_conv_finqa.License Notes: Dataset based on FinQA which is "based on the publicly available earnings reports of S&P 500 companies from 1999 to 2019, collected in the FinTabNet dataset (Zheng et al., 2021)"

Inferred Metadata.PwC Description: SOTA for Question Answering on ConvFinQA (Execution Accuracy metric)

oig-unified_hc3_human.Paper Title: How Close is ChatGPT to Human Experts? Comparison Corpus, Evaluation, and Detection

oig-unified_cuad.Paper Title: CUAD: An Expert-Annotated NLP Dataset for Legal Contract Review

oig-unified_squad_v2_more_neg.Paper Title: Know What You Don't Know: Unanswerable Questions for SQuAD

oig-unified_squad_v2.Paper Title: Know What You Don't Know: Unanswerable Questions for SQuAD
